title: create a mobile app
desc: Design and Build app that allows users to register and create custom events based on the program come dine with me.Users need to be able to- Create profile using facebook twitter or manual- create events- search events- view events- join events- Search for reciepe- submit reciepes- view accepted eventsWhen creating a event the user can select how many people for the event. They can specify if its free or paid event. once the number of people for the event is full each user can then select which date to put there subsequent event.iePerson 1 creates an event for 4 people3 people accept to join eventwhen there is total quota for event is met each user creates event details for hosting their event.So person 2 creates the details of the event they will host, person 3 creates the details of the event they will host and person 4 creates the details of the event they will host.Each persons in the event go to the persons house for dinner or lunch which ever is the event, they then rate the event, the rating is hidden from the users of the events.once every person has visited the events they then see who the winner is.When creating the profile of the person they need to specify how many miles they are willing to travel for event and then when events are shown to them it will only show there selected distance.I am trying to create a app which mimics the program come dine with me.you may want to watch a few episodes of come dine with me on you tube to understand the concept.I am looking for a IOS and android version. there are future plans i have but this is for the concept.DO NOT BID UNLESS YOU HAVE GOOD FEEDBACK, ALL AUTO BIDS WILL BE IGNOREDALSO YOU MUST BE ABLE TO DEMONSTRATE YOUR WORK,You must be able to use your own initiative when working on this project and must be available on skype

title: Hire an App Developer
desc: I am looking to develop a Media and News network.Hiring a developer to create Mobile/Tablet application (Android) to fetch and display media (Images/Videos) from our server every X hours. The media will be played on rotating slideshows and it should also has a page that can display real-time updates pushed from our server for news/weather etc. It should also has a welcome page that displays the current time which synchronize with the net and information from the Account details field. (i.e Name)An admin panel is also needed to be developed for account management (Create, Suspend, Terminate account, input fields to account profile) and pushing of updated media and news to the App. It should also track the uptime of the Client accounts (No. Of Hours Online on the App).Server is able to distribute the Media updates to the Clients App over a period of time so that it will not overload the server.Uses minimal battery consumption and network data on the Client side as it requires to check and log it's online status constantly as well as check for updates periodically.I may also expand to iOS app in the future, therefore being proficient in iOS coding will be great.I would need a clean and secured development of the Android App and Back-end Admin Panel.More details regarding the project will be let known when you reach out to me.

title: Develop a Mobile Application
desc: What Does the App Do:The App is for a Discount Card System which will be purchased at a Merchant, Its usage while Shopping earns the User a Cash Back.User Story:Merchants are registered in our system through offline/online model with KYC.Cards (Cashback, Discount, Unique) are sold to customers online/offlineMerchants will give special offers to card holders.Customer will go to merchant and buy the offered product and show this card. Merchant will enter this transaction in our/their system(API Integrations wherever required).Customer will be given cash back through payment gateways. We have API for this.A referral amount will also be given to person who referred this customer. The referral bonus will go Upto 4 levels upwards.Admin should be able toCheck the number of card holders in the systemDistribute physical cards to holdersAdd merchants and Upload their offers against categoriesView Transactions against merchants/customersGenerate monthly reportsSend cashbacks to customers on weekly basisRequirements1. Splash Screen and Onboarding Intro to App (About in Steps)2. Customer Registration(Fields) Name*Password*DOB*Gender*Email*Mobile No*3. Link Your CardEnter Card Number*Activate ButtonGo to Requirement 14. LoginEnter Card No./MobilePasswordOTP’s and SMS’s5. Store LocatorMap View - Choose Cities OptionList View6. OffersListed Offers with Details and Images7. RewardsTotal Rewards (Calculation of Rewards as Given)My RewardsReferral Purchase Rewards8. Refer FriendsMy Referrals (Nested Tree View)9. My AccountKYC - Upload Photo, Address ID, Pan10. Virtual CardRequest Physical Card - Pay for Card( Fetch Address - Location )11. Paytm Gratification API Integration12. Bill Generation / Invoice Integration13.
